title: Your favorite champion takes you to their house and cooks their favorite meal
body: {{champion:201}} It's cold and all we have is goat

replies.body: {{champion:222}} She cooks the most amazing feast of every kind of food possible, made with only the rarest ingredients cooked to perfect. Hums and sings and whistles while cooking, blushes like a sweet girl when you tell her it smells amazing. As you go to take your first bite, she SMACKS THE FORK OUT OF YOUR HAND AND BLOWS UP THE TABLE!
Next time invite this guy {{champion:115}} then it'll be a party.
No, it won't be a party. It'll be a blast.

{{champion:31}} 
me.
I dunno what {{champion:238}} would cook, probably the severed head of his master. :3

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uYWB53FK,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-08T20:50:59.805+0000)
>
> I dunno what {{champion:238}} would cook, probably the severed head of his master. :3

{{champion:4}}  "I cooked us some Fugu, Summoner. Now, pufferfish is poisonous, if ya do it wrong. Enough to kill a man, in fact. My question to you, is..." 
(stuns you and restrains you to chair)
"...Are ya feelin' *lucky*?"

{{champion:267}}  Sushi!

N-no wait. No that's wrong!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotNurseFlan,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uYWB53FK,comment-id=003a,timestamp=2015-01-10T04:29:36.542+0000)

> {{champion:267}}  Sushi!
> 
> N-no wait. No that's wrong!

SHE COOKS HERSELF, WHAT?!?! =C HOW DARE YOU MAKE HER DO SUCH A THING
Other fish maybe?

Oh. RIP Fizz. Fizz has been nerfed, by Nami cooking him to eat.

Now Fizz only feeds people. >=D get it. feed

{{champion:112}} *brings you home*
Me : are we having some sort of oil mixture?
{{champion:112}} : no.
Me : Do you even eat at all?
{{champion:112}} : yes.
Me : well, what's for dinner?
{{champion:112}} : BEHOLD THE GLORIOUS EVOLVING DINNER!!!
Me: Um, the dinner just grew legs... and is walking away

{{champion:64}} 
goes in the kitchen. makes a bunch of noise, bumps his head, comes out and gives the lamp a spoon

{{champion:50}} : Seeds with fruit?

I really would like something...heavier

{{champion:50}} : Carcasses?

Something cooked...preferably not human

{{champion:50}} ...you want to order Chinese?

Zyra takes me outside under the bright sunshine, buries me to my legs into the ground and pours water on me and the ground.

She is extremely confused when I glare at her.
{{champion:44}} how do you like your gems?
I'd think he'd at least offer you some Rock Candy....
My favorite champion is {{champion:19}}... I think I may be in trouble.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uYWB53FK,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-01-08T20:52:16.003+0000)
>
> My favorite champion is {{champion:19}}... I think I may be in trouble.

"let's make this fun"

{{champion:222}}: Ramen noodles? Oodles of Noodles? Chicken noodle soup? What about with hot sauce?

{{champion:26}}: Food is for those bound by time. I will simply take you back in time to when you were not hungry.

{{champion:268}} "Here you go summoner, a sandwich."

Can't we just get a bucket of fried chicken-

{{champion:268}} "WHAT?!"

{{champion:121}} "My hobby is eating yordles" 

Fried dinger
Slow roasted Kennen
Boiled tristana
Sauteed Corki
Blackened Teemo
Baked Poppy
and of course
Chargrilled Ziggs

Mmmm mmm mmm.

{{champion:80}} 
Tons of sweets. Bakers op
{{champion:111}}  Hoooowww dooooo yoooouuuuu liiiiiike youuurrrr seeeaaaweeeed cooooked?

{{champion:25}} 

I get cookies! Yay!

{{champion:17}} 

"Wanna get high?" Friggin shrooms.

I will cook for Quinn

Me: Dinner ready, i did Fried chicken

Quinn: before we start, Â¿did you see Valor?

Me: ... oh-oh
{{champion:254}} Does she even know how to cook?
{{champion:254}} Here I come to prepare dinner.. Or *wreck* it.

> [{quoted}](name=Arveanor,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uYWB53FK,comment-id=00070002,timestamp=2015-01-09T02:40:42.965+0000)
>
> {{champion:254}} Here I come to prepare dinner.. Or *wreck* it.

Welcome to the first year of marriage. {{champion:254}} is my favorite as well and she's got burned/microwave dinners, instant ramen, and pizza deliveries written all over her. I bet she makes up for it when she goes to book you for resisting arrest though.

> [{quoted}](name=rekt522,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=uYWB53FK,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-01-08T21:51:01.675+0000)

How about a cup of punch in the face? she seems to make that for {{champion:51}} quite often

{{champion:103}} Either we have a wonderful, traditional Korean dinner...

or I'm dinner.

Kinda hoping for the first one.

{{champion:7}} 

2 nice ladies 1 dinner
{{champion:35}}  would either serve me liver with Fava beans and a nice Chianti or we would go eat at Jack in The Box.

{{champion:60}} : "Enjoy this special meal"
Me: Smells so good nom nom nom
{{champion:60}} : "It was the mail man"
Me: I am eating people?!

{{champion:60}} : Why don't you relax by taking a nice soak in this tub before we eat, I'll warm it up for you.
Me: Gee something smell great
{{champion:60}} : Yesss...
Me: Boy this bath is getting a little hot...

{{champion:412}} Delightful agony, followed by sucking my soul out through my eye sockets.
{{champion:222}} Jinx can't cook, so instead she opts to blow up the bakery down the street and we enjoy whatever's left.
{{champion:80}} Why the bakery

{{champion:131}}  Moon cakes
{{champion:105}}  Fish
{{champion:238}}  A bowl of noodles boiled in your midlaner's tears
{{champion:117}} It's gonna taste purple, I can tell you that
{{champion:96}} Everything

{{champion:41}} 
Appetizer of rum 
For dinner, we have oranges, served with Grog.
Finished with a light dessert of: more rum.

{{champion:77}} Would you like grilled bear, tiger steak, turtle soup or a phoenix egg omlette?

Me: Uh..... maybe the...

{{champion:34}} Stares angrily as the room chills
{{champion:106}} Roars as Lightning tips his claws
{{champion:267}} Seethes as 3 magic orbs appear around her
{{champion:107}} Disappears and a ! appears above my head

Me: On second thought, I'm not that hungry...

{{champion:9}} I... I can't really cook.

Me: Makes sense. You don't even have a sto-

{{champion:9}} No! Not that! I mean, that too, but this place has no oven or stove! It's a closet!

Me: Ah. Right. That's a problem. So, what's your favorite?

{{champion:9}} Marrow.

Me: OH GOOD LO-

{{champion:9}} Usually on French bread, with a supremed orange and some parsley. Hard to make with stick arms, though.

Me: Oh. Well, I can probably get the ingredients tonight, then bring it all tomorrow once I'm done cooking.

{{champion:9}} That defeats the spirit of the thread, though.

Me: The what?

{{champion:9}} * QEW *

Me: [RIP in pepperoni]
{{champion:161}} A pile of ash

{{champion:59}} 
You like my cooking? Come for a closer look!
{{champion:157}} Cooks up a pentakill, just for me.
{{champion:89}}  Serves up a mean sunny side up egg, sun dried tomatoes garnished with Sunflower seeds, and some Sunny D to drink.
